questions.quote: You know you should keep in touch. Something may be opening up in a few weeks. Is that a Bruline?
Oh, look at this one! It's saying, 'I'm a coffee table, put some coffee on me! Oh, the hotter the better, that's what I'm here for!'
Oh, Elaine. George, when momma said 'Bosco' she must have been trying to communicate something, a legacy, a dying wish perhaps.
Alright, that's it for me. You've been great. Goodnight everybody.
Look, Java World.  Hey listen I'm gonna get out here. I'm gonna get myself a free cafe latte.
Yeah. Come on. I mean, think about it. He's engaged to be married. Your top priority is soup.
You might want to try it...makes the movie more enjoyable, that's all.
Oh right, right! The blue sweatpants! Gees, it's too bad you can't say anything because of Angela.
Hey Babaloo, you better get home. You know this guy Bookman from the library he's waiting for ya.
No, no. Vincent, I... Don't shut me out.  I just, I know you feel what I feel.
